alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 4:58PM MST until February 23 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted. Blowing and drifting snow may reduce visibility particularly for Logan and Laketown Summits through this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
